name: Blazeline
description:
First of all, thank you to the GMTK Team Finder site for allowing us five individuals to form a team and take part - Sigalov

A flame is attached to you by a rope, and you need to use it to get to the end of the level. It is your source of light, heat, and ignition. But it's still attached to you. Can you use all that power without getting burned by the flame?

Credits:

  • Team Lead/Programmer: Sigalov
  • Programmer: adrien stuck silver
  • Artist 1: Lmnskid
  • Artist 2: MrMuffin
  • Musician/Writer: AveragePhoenix
